name: Faint Memory
description:
Explore your lost memories in this creepy horror game and use your trusty camera to remember the moments that were important in your life. 

How to Win:

Using your camera take a picture of all 7 memories.

Controls:

*Make sure to pick up the camera at the start!*

WASD - Movement

Right Click - Take out Camera

Left Click - Take Picture (Only if Reticle is Green!)

Tab - Opens Photo Gallery (Selecting a Photo Makes That Area Visible)

Escape - Exit Game
